message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us. I am willing to sell the product to you for $11,500.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, $11,500 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with right now. I'm willing to pay $10,500 for the product.  Let's see if we can find a middle ground.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle. Considering the value this product holds for you, I am willing to accept $10,800 for it. This is my final offer.
